_note: Axis definitions for persona, jobs-to-be-done, and conversion style. Authoritative source for AI agents when generating landing variants.
_agentGuidelines: Pick exactly one variant per axis when proposing a new landing page.
Use the descriptions + example copy to keep tone consistent with the selected combination.
Avoid disallowed combinations unless the constraints file is explicitly updated.

persona._note: Primary buyer persona that the copy should target.

variants.label: Operations Leader
variants.description: Director/VP of Operations running multi-scenario deployments.

examples.headline: Standardize automation launches across every team
examples.tagline: Ops can spin up bundles with governance already baked in.

agentHints: Connect variant performance to reduced launch risk.

variants.label: Automation Freelancer
variants.description: Solo builders packaging services into SaaS offerings.

examples.headline: Turn client automations into recurring revenue
examples.tagline: Sell bundles with pricing, licensing, and downloads ready.

agentHints: Focus on time-to-value and prebuilt monetization.
Highlight starter bundles and hands-on onboarding.

variants.label: Product Marketer
variants.description: Go-to-market lead validating new scenario bundles.

examples.headline: Launch a GTM experiment in hours
examples.tagline: Bundle-ready templates collect metrics and feed next launch.

agentHints: Tie messaging to campaign velocity and analytics.
CTA should bias toward demo or live workshop.

jtbd._note: Jobs-to-be-done that the visitor expects to accomplish.

variants.label: Launch New Bundle
variants.description: Standing up the first production deployment of a scenario suite.
agentHints: Call out blueprinting, templated PRDs, and review workflows.

variants.label: Scale Agency Services
variants.description: Turn bespoke automations into repeatable products with metered subscriptions.
agentHints: Highlight subscription gating, download entitlements, and reporting.

variants.label: Improve Conversions
variants.description: Optimize an existing landing flow via experimentation + analytics.
agentHints: Lean on analytics, variant testing, and insights automation.

conversionStyle._note: Conversion motion emphasized on the page.

variants.label: Self-Serve Checkout
variants.description: Visitors purchase bundles immediately via pricing cards.
agentHints: Ensure hero CTA goes to pricing or checkout.

variants.label: Demo-Led
variants.description: Drive towards booking a live walkthrough with an architect.

examples.headline: See Browser Automation Studio in action
examples.tagline: Schedule a live build session with the factory team.

agentHints: Hero CTA should be demo booking.

variants.label: Founder/Operator Call
variants.description: Warm leads into a founder conversation or waitlist.
agentHints: Tone can be more personal; mention operator playbooks.

constraints._note: Prevent freelancers from pairing demo-led flows with optimization JTBD until the playbooks are ready.
